q1: What is the Belgium soccer team roster?
a1: I cannot name all the players on the Belgium team but I know that the main goalkeeper is THIBAUT COURTOIS .
q2: How far did they make it in the last World Cup?
a2: Belgium only made it to the semi finals in the last cup.
q3: Will the Belgian team be able to improve their performance at the next World Cup?
q4: They will, but I doubt Belgium will win.
a4: I agree, Belgium may not have the top tier star power for the World Cup but they are definite contenders.
q5: Belgium are those underdogs you want to win!
a5: They're a small country but they have a great deal of talent
